dc:title: Untitled review of Art and Faith
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Has high praise for a pamphlet by artist Fritz Eichenberg. Includes quotes on the misuse of art in advertising, the beauty of creative acts, and the role of the artist in society.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 646 1953-03-02 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
